Sequence Information.Peptide Name: VrD1 (V. radiata defensin 1; natural AMPs; 3S=S; UCSS1a; plants; ZZI)

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: recombinant peptide inhibited Gram+ S. epidermidis (IC50 36.6 ug/ml), B.cereus (IC50 >500 ug/ml), Gram- X. campestris pv. vesicatoria (IC50 40.8 ug/ml), S.typhimurium (IC50 143.4 ug/ml), E.coli (IC50 >500 ug/ml), E. carotovora pv. carotovora (IC50 1000 ug/ml), P.vulgaris (IC50 >1000 ug/ml), S.enteritidis (IC50 >1000 ug/ml), P.syringae pv. syringae (IC50 >1000 ug/ml), fungi F. oxysporum (IC50 30-53.2 ug/ml), P. oryza, R. solani, and T.rubrum ()IC50 >500 ug/ml) (Chen et al., 2005). It is also insecticidal against bruchids (Liu et al., 2006). The peptide inhibits alpha-amylase, required for the digestion of plants in the insect gut.Structure:  Structure reported by Liu et al (2006) Proteins 63: 777-786.You can rotate, zoom, and view the 3D structureherein the PDB.Recombinant production:yeast:Pichia pastoris: expressed (Chen et al., 2004).Update 11/24/09; 2/2014; 11/2024.
Literature Information.Author: Chen JJ et al Chen CS2004
Literature Information.Title: Cloning and functional expression of a mungbean defensin VrD1 in Pichia pastoris
